urgent.action: Fix HTTP to HTTPS redirect - http://www.konacoffeedonut.com/en has 93 impressions with 0 clicks. Ensure 301 redirect to https version and update canonical tags
urgent.reasoning: 93 impressions wasted on non-canonical URL. Google is indexing HTTP version which splits ranking signals and confuses users.

urgent.action: Optimize title tag and meta description for homepage to include 'donuts near me' and add compelling call-to-action mentioning Waikiki location and opening date
urgent.reasoning: 24 impressions at position 10.3 with 0 clicks indicates poor snippet appeal. This is highest-volume local intent keyword.

urgent.action: Audit desktop rendering - check for layout issues, slow load times, or poor above-fold content. Desktop has 602 impressions but only 2 clicks (0.33% CTR vs 3.5% mobile)
urgent.reasoning: Desktop accounts for 74% of impressions but drastically underperforms mobile. Likely UX or rendering issue losing potential customers.

urgent.action: Review Korean about-kona-coffee page meta tags - position 2 with 18 impressions but 0 clicks suggests misleading or unappealing snippet
urgent.reasoning: Ranking #2 with zero clicks means the title/description isn't resonating with Korean searchers despite excellent position.

quickWins.action: Add schema markup (LocalBusiness, Restaurant) and ensure NAP consistency. Create dedicated landing page section for 'Donuts in Waikiki'
quickWins.reasoning: Position 10.3 is close to page 1 top. Moving to top 5 could capture significant local search traffic.

quickWins.action: Add 'coffee near me' and 'Waikiki coffee' to H2 headings and body content. Ensure Google My Business is optimized for coffee category
quickWins.reasoning: Position 19 with 6 impressions - high volume keyword worth pushing into top 10.

quickWins.action: Rewrite meta description to be more compelling - mention '100% Kona Coffee', 'Waikiki', and opening date. Current 4.2% CTR at position 7.8 can improve
quickWins.reasoning: 24 impressions but only 1 click. Better meta could double CTR without ranking changes.

quickWins.action: Create dedicated content block combining Hawaiian coffee culture with donut offerings. Use exact phrase in H2
quickWins.reasoning: Position 10.7 for highly relevant query. Small content optimization could push to top 5.

quickWins.action: Add 'Waikiki' prominently to homepage title, create location-specific content section mentioning nearby landmarks
quickWins.reasoning: Position 58 for hyper-relevant local query. Basic on-page optimization could dramatically improve ranking.

opportunities.action: Expand Japanese content - Japan is second largest market with 26 impressions. Optimize Japanese FAQ and menu pages with local search terms
opportunities.reasoning: Strong Japanese tourist market in Waikiki. Japanese searchers showing intent - capture with localized content.

opportunities.action: Create comprehensive malasada content - this Hawaiian donut specialty can capture tourist searches. Include history, ingredients, preparation
opportunities.reasoning: Korean malasada page getting impressions. Expand to all languages to capture 'malasada waikiki' searches.

opportunities.action: Create time-sensitive content for Feb 25 grand opening - optimize for 'new donut shop waikiki', 'opening soon' terms
opportunities.reasoning: Opening in 5 days provides unique SEO opportunity. Fresh content about grand opening can capture news and local interest.

insights.observation: Mobile CTR (3.5%) dramatically outperforms Desktop (0.33%) despite desktop having 4x more impressions
insights.suggestion: Prioritize desktop UX audit. Check for layout shifts, pop-ups, or slow rendering that may discourage clicks on desktop

insights.observation: Brand terms 'kona coffee donut' dominate clicks (8/16 = 50%) with excellent CTR (53.8%)
insights.suggestion: Brand awareness is working. Focus on capturing non-brand local intent terms to expand reach

insights.observation: Low overall engagement metrics expected for pre-opening business. 16 clicks/week is good baseline
insights.suggestion: Post-opening, expect 3-5x increase in branded searches. Prepare FAQ and menu pages for traffic surge

insights.observation: Japan (26 impressions) and Korea (18 impressions on Korean page) showing strong interest
insights.suggestion: Waikiki tourist market responding. Ensure multi-language pages have consistent schema and opening info
